title: The Beats go on: percussion from Pleistocene to Paradiddle
creator_credit: Lee Mishkin, Nick Bosustow, Stephen Bosustow Productions and Xerox Films
brief_description: Traces the existence of percussion instruments throughout man’s history, examining both development and playing techniques. Considers the types of idiophones which make a sound when they are hit, shaken or struck. Features drummer, Shelly Manne. Suitable for secondary years 7-12.
